name: Pipin Lefrog's Christmas
description:
I just finished the early prototype... This release is for anyone who wants to playtest and see how well it runs on more than one computer... Report issues here (Shake's house): https://discord.gg/dEEKhtq

This is still in development right now...

The development is taking longer than expected due to the fact that I've over scoped myself.  There are still a lot of parts of this game that are just not working.  The run animation is all over the place, I've got the concepts for the graphics but I still don't have that added yet, and some of the music I've made doesn't land well with me.  So I have some work to do to get this game done.  It's going to take about a year (or more) to get this game done, and done as I intended it.  I'd rather ship a quality product than some buggy rushed game.  Thank you for understanding.

I still have a few more, graphics and sounds to make.  It's going to be a platformer with a cartoonish look and feel.  I am going for an orchestrated score to really cement this.
